snippet: Chinese officials said they had not yet found any human-to-human transmission of avian influenza, but they were tracking people who had been in contact with those who were ill.
abstract: Chinese and World Health Organization officials say that they have still not yet found any human-to-human transmission of spreading form of avian influenza, after confirming three more infections among humans.
lead_paragraph: Chinese officials said they had not yet found any human-to-human transmission of avian influenza, but they were tracking people who had been in contact with those who were ill.

headline.seo: Chinese Bird Flu Continues to Spread
headline.main: China Reports New Cases of Bird Flu
headline.print_headline: New Cases Of Bird Flu Are Reported By Chinese
